SystemLabel.SearchStop: Stop after finding the first seed

ErrorMessage.IvsFormat: Invalid IVs. Every IV should be a whole number between 0 and 31 (inclusive)
ErrorMessage.IvsStrict1: The first Pokemon must have at least one IV of 31.
ErrorMessage.IvsStrict2: The second Pokemon must have at least one IV of 31.
ErrorMessage.IvsStrict351_3V: 4th Frame: 3IV Pokemon must have 3 IVs equal to 31.
ErrorMessage.IvsStrict351_2V: 4th Frame: 2IV Pokemon must have 2 IVs equal to 31.
ErrorMessage.NotSearchTab: Please open the correct tab before searching for a Den Seed.
ErrorMessage.NotFound: Sorry! no Den Seed was found! Increasing the Allowed IV Deviation may help.
ErrorMessage.MaxFrameFormat: Invalid Max Frames. Please ensure that it is a number.
ErrorMessage.VFormat: Levels, HP, Atk, Def, Sp.Atk., Sp.Def., Spd. must be numbers!
ErrorMessage.CouldNotCalculateIVs: Could not calculate IVs. Please check that the data you entered is correct.

SystemMessage.FindManySeeds: Multiple possible Den Seeds were found. Check seeds.text for more details.
